title: How do you pick your skin?
body:
For those of you that have several skins for your main, how do you choose? Is it random or a system?

For me with Brand...

Spirit Fire if I know I'm going to stomp the lane.

Apocalyptic if the matchup is unknown or if any of my team is toxic. (Get it?)

Classic if I know I'm going to be stomped.

For Taric:

Classic whenever I feel like it.

Bloodstone when ranked or serious.

5th Age Armor when ARAM or relaxed.

With Viktor....

Creator always.

replies.body: I dunno, I was kind of born with mine tbh.

Lordekaiser is my all time Tryhard skin, because the Mace feels like it could shatter mountains

King of Clubs when I roll Mid lane since I'm the center of the team and thus the King

Pentakill whenever I know I'm going man-mode

Infernal if I feel trolly

Dragon Knight, now that's like some fine Wine, it comes out every once in a while and marks the beginning of the enemy's doom.

DJ by default.

Sweetheart or Classic if I'm feeling like it.

Silent Night if it's snowdown.

Guqin if it's Lunar Revel or I'm feeling it.

Arcade if I'm supporting an MF. I'll always ask if she has the skin so we can match.

I don't use Muse or Pentakill Sona despite owning them because I'm a vain bastard who finds it weird that those skins don't have her trade mark huge ponytails, and it kinda dissappoints me. I should use Pentakill more just for the rock music but I miss the ponytails and she looks so much like Katarina, whom I despise with a passion.

I love Bewitching ~~because of the login view~~ because its sound effects are much more subtle than her base and other skins. Binding and Pool are much quieter when cast. And if there's a Teemo in the game I can recall and type "Fire burn and cauldron bubble. Teemo, we summon thee..."

Freljord Taliyah. I have choices I swear.

Academy Ekko because i dont like the Project Ekko's hair, and standstorm would take me getting used to the particles.

Winter Wonder Ori. I like winter and dont own TPA. Most of the other models are bad. If i did own TPA it'd be 50/50.

Master Arcanist Ziggs. I dont own snow day and the rest are pretty terrible quality.

Warring Kingdoms Kat. I dont own Project or else it'd be 50/50. I like the particles on this skin and it feels cleaner than the rest. I need project Kat in my life though at some point though.

-----------

When I used to play Ahri: 
Challenger - Normally
Popstar - if I got bored of challenger
Dynasty/Midnight - if i wanted to calm down
(Firefox is trash)

Well my main main is Janna, but I only have one skin for her, which is tempest Janna. I like that it's legacy and so semi-rare, so I'm not too desperate for another janna skin (don't care for forecast), but star guardian janna certain tickles my fancy, and so I'd probably switch it around every now and then (especially if there was another SG skin on the team).

My old main was cait, and I have sheriff and officer cait. My default is officer cait simply because it's the most expensive and I got it as a gift so want to make sure I get value out of it, but I'll occasionally cycle in sheriff cait for the odd game here or there. If I'm in in queue with someone I just played with (either through random matchmaking or as a premade), I'll usually change skins just to show off the collection as well.


If they ever did introduce a 'random' skin option, I'd probably default to that for most champs though and only manually pick one if there was teamwide skinergy to be had. Right now manually being random is a pain though.

I only have skins for Mundo and Sion and I don't play Sion much.

Corporate Mundo all the time.

Whenever I decide to play Mundo, I play Corporate Mundo.

For Sona: 

DJ almost always, but typically Silent Night or Sweetheart if I don't want to use it. I usually only use arcade for other arcade skins. 

For Orianna: 

Winter Wonder almost always, I love the light colors and recall animation. Heartseeker if playing Orianna support or whenever I'm feeling it. Gothic whenever I'm serious about a match. Despite owning every skin, I usually don't use the others compared to those three. 

For Nami: 

Typically I use Koi (Have to love the koi in ebb and flow and the flutes during the ult), but use Deep Sea whenever I want to get serious. Occasionally I use River Spirit but that's only if I want to match with my adc's skin.

For Taliyah: 

Usually choose Freljord as I adore all of it's effects and Taliyah's recall. I also enjoy the freljordian markings on her arms and her hair. However, I choose default when I want to switch things up or enjoy the pleasing sound effects (I love the q and e). 

For Aurelion Sol: 

Classic. Always.

Sorry if this was long winded!

I main support and matching the ADC is all it matters.

If there's nothing to match I either pick whatever looks more fitting, or pick whatever the hell I want.
